Patients type two diabetes mellitus patient confirm chronic periodontitis select randomly assign two group . The treatment group receive immediate full-mouth scaling root plan whereas control group schedule receive periodontal treatment follow 3-month visit . Plaque index , bleed index , probe pocket depth , recession cervical attachment loss record baseline , six week three month . Glycated haemoglobin ( HbA1c ) C-reactive protein ( CRP ) analyse baseline three month follow enrolment .
